SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_GETIDSETCOUNT
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Gets the number of rows in a selection
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GETIDSETCOUNT ( @IDSetRegisterID uniqueidentifier, -- Specify a Selection Set ID to get the count for @SelectionCount int = NULL output) -- The number of rows for the specified selection
as begin begin try select @SelectionCount = count(*) from UFN_IDSETREADER_GETRESULTS (@IDSetRegisterID) end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0 end
